snippet: One of the nation's largest public pensions said it would vote to block Kinder Morgan's $21 billion takeover of the El Paso Corporation, citing a lack of transparency and a conflict of interest related to the company's merger adviser.
abstract: One of the nation's largest public pensions said it would vote to block Kinder Morgan's $21 billion takeover of the El Paso Corporation, citing a lack of transparency and a conflict of interest related to the company's merger adviser.

headline.main: Pension Fund to Vote Against Kinder Morgan-El Paso Deal
